This dataset is a subset of the Global RIver-lanD (GRID) Database and includes surface water and ocean data in the northern Gulf of Mexico [Click this link](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-024-04338-1){target="_blank"} to access the corresponding peer-reviewed article that interprets the dataset. In addition, the dataset can be downloaded via this [data DOI](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10152141){target="_blank"}.
